title: Sourcing Manager / Sourcing Operations Expert (f/m) in Products & Services / Frankfurt
description: the products service sourcing team within global procurement we are responsible for the procurement strategy sourcing execution customer engagement and vendor management across the gsa germany switzerland austria product services categories facilities management brand marketing and communications talent hr and professional services including consulting spend this role as sourcing manager sourcing operations expert f m you ll support the procurement organization by developing and evaluating procurement specific reporting building a procurement project pipeline and delivering value through cost savings and cost avoidance building overseeing projects and measurements you ll help improve source to pay process efficiencies for all our procurement categories you ll establish a clear vision for the processes and systems for source to pay market the department s services to senior leaders and develop strategicen performance goals to achieve this you ll be expected to work frequently with local stakeholders ey partners and leaders your tasks to help you progress develop strong relationships with key stakeholders within region business units and report procurement progress via regular meetings build a solid procurement specific reporting to monitor compliance and define a pipeline of procurement projects for the region collaboration with local stakeholders achieve cost reduction targets help to develop new cost reduction strategies and improve negotiable spend via sourcing and demand management monitor and support our source to pay process within our region by providing best practices setting and recommending priorities and driving the ramp up of increased usage of our processes and tools develop and foster vendor relations from a business perspective to include regular assessments risk management and innovativ processes contribute driving the standardization of global processes and operations and ensure compliance to the procurement policy by education of local ey staff and presentations to stakeholders gather ideas and drive thoughts within the community to introduce and implement your profile to help us progress togetherbachelor s degree or equivalent work experience a relevant field preferably supply chain management or economics at least two years of procurement experience and understanding of procurement principals category management including but not limited to sourcing and demand management very good operation skills to develop complex spend analysis and understanding s2p processes very good understanding of a company s indirect spend finance and controlling proven track record delivering cost savings and process improvements good knowledge of a range of procurement tools techniques and accountabilities ranging from supplier management strategicen sourcing and operational procurement s2p high level of personal energy and strong bias for action excellent written and verbal communication skills must be able to communicate fluently german and english both verbally and writing experience of working a global and complex organization and liaising with different cultures change management and influencing skills to drive desired changes and implement strategy excellent presentation skills and the ability to interact with senior management excellent microsoft office skills with main focus on excel formulas vba skills preferred interested the position then send us your application if you have any questions please do not hesitate to call our recruiting center on about us welcome to the major league the global ey organization is a leader assurance tax transaction and advisory services we leverage our experience knowledge and services to help build trust and confidence the capital markets and economies the world over our global purpose is to drive progress and make a difference by building a better working world for our people for our clients and for our communities we seek and nurture talents smart people love challenges want to make a difference and not to mark time their professional careers and because we are aware of this we offer you every opportunity for outstanding career we nurture talents because our success depends on the abilities the attitude and the competencies of our employees when you join us you can expect a varied and international working environment which you can ideally develop your abilities and gain inspiration and motivation while inspiring and motivating others we offer you exciting tasks you find a wide range of career opportunities at ey whether you opt for a career advisory services assurance services tax law services transaction advisory services or core business services you quickly assume responsibility tackle exciting challenges and work for big name clients often at international level moreover depending on your particular interests you can focus on eith the industry sector or the banking and insurance sector financial services each of our service lines joining us is easy no matter where you are today or where you want to be tomorrow we offer first class prospects and development opportunities our tailored support enables you to shape your career a way that enables you to achieve your goals start your career the way that best suits you and become part of our global network benefit for a lifetime whenever you join ey however long you stay the exceptional experience with us lasts a lifetime ey makes this promise to all its employees and offers them opportunities for ideal personal and professional development we help you identify your talents and achieve your potential take your first step toward a promising future today and apply for a position with us what we offer additional benefits for employees we treat the welfare of our employees as a top priority this includes not only a competitive salary and a performance related bonus but a pleasant atmosphere which our teams can work efficiently addition we offer a wide range of attractive social benefits including vehicle leasing financial support and leave for employees taking professional exams option of bonus the form of money or time company health insurance ey bkk company pension direct life insurance pension fund various types of insurance such as accident and baggage insurance services from our cooperation partners for child care care for relatives favorable terms and conditions from selected gyms health clubs high performance and work life balance there is life before during and after work we want to meet this expectation as far as possible while we demand great commitment from our employees we offer them flexible working models this is because we know that greater quality of life raises employee satisfaction and thus performance and that is a win win situation what we offer part time models tailored to individuals specific needs options for short and long term release from duties hours or days off as compensation for overtime conversion of bonus into time credits support with care for children and other relatives mobile working and working from home employee assistance program career and development internship training or dual study program opportunities for entry level employees our good reputation is thanks to the talented individuals we employ that s why we support and nurture our interns trainees and students from the very outset no matter which of our service lines you join you re a member of our team from the very first day you take responsibility for tasks accompany your team on business trips and are deployed on site at clients premises everything you do you gain valuable hands on experience if you impress us with your exceptional commitment and outstanding performance during your internship we offer you additional development opportunities by admitting you to our even greater development opportunities for the best this incentive program we have prepared exclusive service package for you which benefits you a variety of ways you can attend seminars over several days receive support with seminar papers and final year dissertations and you have the opportunity to participate international events for ey interns gaining experience abroad interested working abroad with us you can gain experience around the globe even as intern apply for our premium program gain insight into one of our international locations and work there for two to six months start training straight from school you can join ey even if you do not have a degree for example as a budding qualified tax clerk or future office management specialist you can complete the respective three year at many of our offices you receive a theoretical grounding at your vocational college and gain practical insight at one of our offices or at our clients premises after qualifying tax clerks can continue their training to become tax specialists or chief accountants dual study program with practical insights want to achieve more then why not combine theory and practice by completing a with us if you have university entry qualifications or training and professional experience you can start your course of study for a bachelor s degree while acquiring theoretical knowledge at a cooperative university you learn the practical skills at one of our offices for the entire duration of your studies you not only receive attractive salary but can develop a professional network at early stage our values our diversity shape your future with ey application process the global ey organization refers to all member firms of ernst young global limited eyg each eyg member firm is a separate legal entity and has no liability for another such entity s acts or omissions ernst young global limited a uk company limited by guarantee does not provide services to clients for more information please visit

title: Finance Manager Prime Music (m/f)
description: amazon seeks experienced finance manager m f to be a key partner with the digital music business with the launch of prime music uk de this is exciting time to join the digital music business as we find innovativ means of delighting our customers we need someone with a strong analytical background to value new business models evaluate new features and build analytical tools to bring new concepts and ideas to life this role be a good fit if you are highly analytical detailed oriented and enjoy developing financial models for unique and new opportunities thrive a fasen growing business and are able to multi task with several priorities are a self starter deal well with cross functional teams and ambiguous situationskey responsibilities analyse the income statement from revenue to fixed costs manage the financial planning and analysis effort and forecast various metrics for financial risks and opportunities report on the financial and business performance for global business and lead the preparation of weekly monthly and annual financial review manage the budget of operating expenses and headcount for the business influence business decision by effective verbal and written communication data driven analysis and modeling and presentation of alternatives build business models to value new features to add to prime musicthis role requires a self starter with strong business modeling and creative problem solving skills a keen attention to detail ability to work a fasen paced environment with ambiguous situations and solid skills data mining and business intelligence this role has regular interaction with various business units across amazon and requires strong interpersonal and communication skills basic qualifications several years of relevant experience advanced excel business modeling skills required financial statements analysis master s degree business administration preferred or equivalent years of relevant business experience some years of financial analysis experience with a high growth company or a consulting firm strong financial modeling skills including excellent knowledge of microsoft excel and microsoft access cognos obiee and sql experience a strong plus hard working detail oriented and committed to producing excellent quality end products team player with a positiv attitudepreferred qualifications several years of experience a high growth company or consulting firm a self teacher and quick learner able to pick up the technical skills e g basic sql necessary for any project a record of increasing development production and application as well as on the close cooperation with our customers ott hydromet is a part of the globally operating danaher corporation to reinforce the team at our headquarter kempten southern germany we are looking for a committed senior controller financial planning analysis fp a the senior controller financial planning analysis fp a reports directly to the vice president finance and serves as a business partner to the ott hydromet subsidiaries and our senior management this function the controller fp a provide the vp finance with the necessary data reporting analysis and insights essential to the european business he she be embedded within the ott business segment main responsibilities ott europe segment s balance sheet and p l with full budget control and forecast responsibility work close with senior management to build and monitor key performance indicators kpis highlighting trends and analyzing causes of unexpected variance and drive continuous improvements kaizen own and drive monthly rolling sales and opex forecasting process as well as annual budget planning process for all departments build business case and supporting roic analysis r d and operations investments depth product production controlling calculation build and review cost allocation sheet ad hoc financial modeling and analysis assist with m a related financial modeling and due diligence profile the successful candidate should have the ability to convert operating and financial data into business strategy furthermore the candidate should have strong interpersonal skills and the ability to interact with upper levels of management he she is able and willing to take action and knows when and how to dig into details education skills and experience diploma or master degree finance or accounting mba or equivalent minimum of years controlling finance accounting experience with at least years fp a and supervisory roles preferred experience supporting a production facility expert level excel skills business fluent english language skills experience using accounting and financial planning software inforln bi knowledge of m a activity including due diligence offer we can offer you exciting challenges as part of a team of professionals furthermore the international focus of our company open up excellent future prospects for you as expanding supplier the environmental and meteorology sectors we create opportunities for personal and professional development we are looking forward to receiving your detailed application including your desired salary and earliest possible starting dat ott hydromet gmbh human resources

title: Senior Group Finance Controller (m/f)
description: drive and perform the budgeting and forecasting processes across the respective locations monitor analyze and explain variations between plan and actuals and propose counteractive measures prepare and publish timely monthly financial statements to the headquarter identify and track risks and opportunities within the budgeted and forecasted figures continuously inform senior management about the financial situation and forecast support month end quarter end and year end closing process according to us gaap support implementation of erp system sap b1 with help of external consultants ensure quality control over financial transactions and financial reporting manage and comply with local state and federal government reporting requirements and tax filings manage business processes and accounting policies to maintain and strengthen internal controls maintain and improve controlling methods and processes ensure financial processes are setup line with local definitions and ensure the fulfillment of our finance global guidelines anforderungsprofil proven working experience as a controller experience with financial processes is desirable thorough knowledge of accounting principles and procedures a graduate degree with a business administration background good knowledge of us gaap and sox knowledge of sap strong command of english and german languages both written and spoken good communicator who can work with remote teams resourceful with a hands on mentality advanced user of ms office especially excel vergütungspaket lucrative salary package kontakt title: Senior Financial Analyst (f/m) Digital Music
description: amazon seeks a senior financial analyst f m to be a key partner with the digital music business with the launch of prime music uk de this is exciting time to join the digital music business as we find innovativ means of delighting our customers we need someone with a strong analytical background to value new business models evaluate new features and build analytical tools to bring new concepts and ideas to life this role be a good fit if you are highly analytical detailed oriented and enjoy developing financial models for unique and new opportunities thrive a fasen growing business and are able to multi task with several priorities are a self starter deal well with cross functional teams and ambiguous situationskey responsibilities analyse the income statement from revenue to fixed costs manage the financial planning and analysis effort and forecast various metrics for financial risks and opportunities report on the financial and business performance for global business and lead the preparation of weekly monthly and annual financial review manage the budget of operating expenses and headcount for the business influence business decision by effective verbal and written communication data driven analysis and modeling and presentation of alternatives build business models to value new features to add to prime musicthis role requires a self starter with strong business modeling and creative problem solving skills a keen attention to detail ability to work a fasen paced environment with ambiguous situations and solid skills data mining and business intelligence this role has regular interaction with various business units across amazon and requires strong interpersonal and communication skills basic qualifications years of relevant experience advanced excel business modeling skills required financial statements analysis master s degree business administration preferred or equivalent years of relevant business experience a title: Manager Reserve Options (m/f)
description: rwe supply trading is a leading european energy trading house for commodities both their physical and derivative forms as one of europe s strongest competitors the gas industry we optimise rwe s entire non regulated gas business our headquarters essen germany boast europe s largest energy trading floor complementing additional sites europe the middle east asia and the americas we are looking for a new and engaged team member your tasks monetising the short term flexibility inherent rwe s continental european pow generation portfolio marketing of reserve and ancillary services primary auctions tenders and secondary markets trading of exotic otc options such as strips of calls spread options and bespoke structures taking the initiative identifying and realising commercial opportunities around the real options and balancing market products correlation analysis etc managing the desk s positions short term markets tenors from day ahead down to intra day and imbalance market as well as hedging long term exposures cooperating closely with other asset position managing desks and op cos to continuously maximise pnl increase market efficiency and develop the trading interchange platforms etc maintaining a close working relationship with it and dbas to ensure the desk s trading systems and databases run smoothly and to the required standards guiding regulatory affairs department focussing lobbying efforts on commercially most relevant topics market access tso reserves redispatch etc your profile university degree mathematics physics finance economics or equivalent with background financial mathematics or physics and programming ability to spot profitable trading opportunities as well as knowledge legal contractual matters ability to formulate contracts and get commercial concepts across to the legal department good communication skills and ability to maintain good working relationships with neighbour desks market participants regulators grid operators etc be driven and motivated by commercial acumen strong background derivatives pricing theory stochastic processes and statistics as well as vba excel pl sql and object oriented programming languages python c etc strong background linear mixed integ optimisation lp solve coin etc as well as knowledge computer algebra systems matlab etc written and spoken english are equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all sections of the community please find more information about us and your opportunities at rwe here monetising the short term options bespoke structures taking initiative identifying realising commercial opportunities around the real options balancing market products correlation analysis managing desk s positions short term markets tenors day ahead intra day imbalance market hedging long term exposures cooperating closely other asset position managing desks op cos continuously maximise pnl increase market efficiency develop the trading interchange platforms maintaining close working relationship it dbas ensure the desk s trading systems databases run smoothly required standards guiding regulatory affairs title: Risk Analyst Portfolio Models (m/f) Global Model Validation & Governance
description: deutsch bank analyse discover global opportunities for responsible minds at deutsch bank sometimes you have to look closely to bring synergy to our business areas our strategy is the result of analysis creativity and a determination to be a leading global bank with roots germany we re investing digital technology infrastructure and structural changes that make us more efficient more resilient and less complex we ve taken a good look at our business now it s your turn risk analyst portfolio models m f global model validation governance frankfurt main full time about sustainable investments team si working close collaboration with various units around the world global model validation governance is responsible for reviewing and validating models covering credit market and operational risk addition to communicating model risk throughout deutsch bank it forms integral part of the risk division which is relied upon to help shape the strategy of the organisation and the wider industry agenda your team as a member of the portfolio models and alpha team you provide a high end validation service for all portfolio models relating to credit business and operational risk this involve conducting complex mathematical analyses and maintaining a close dialogue with key stakeholders pursuit of best class results your responsibilities this role you contribute to the independent validation of portfolio models including the alpha factor for the purpose of capturing wrong way risk derivatives transactions your tasks include collecting key data performing extensive analyses and discussing your findings with other units support of effective risk management addition the position involve activities and measures aimed at enhancing existing validation concepts as part of the continuous improvement process you be expected to conduct impact studies and draw up well conceived intelligible reports and presentations for various committees embracing our culture of excellence you review and assess analyses performed by the development team order to address any existing validation related issues last but not least your responsibilities include presenting the team s validation results to regulators and external auditors requirements to be considered for this role you require a solid degree mathematics statistics physics econometrics or a similar discipline proficiency the use of ms office and programming languages e g vba c matlab is essential as is a proven track record data analysis the role calls for a high standard of numeracy preferably the field of statistics and or financial mathematics finely honed problem solving skills and a structured approach together with attention to detail and the ability to work independently as well as a team are key prerequisites last but not least your credentials include well developed communication skills and a strong command of german and english both written and spoken vera bölting tel nationalities at deutsch bank across more than countries diversity drives deutsch bank

title: Senior Finance Manager
description: at amazon we re working to be the most customer centric company on earth operations is at the heart of what we do delivering hundreds of thousands of items each day and fulfilling customer orders from all over the world the operations team is seeking a senior finance manager to provide financial support and control to various critical projects the role be located munich key responsibilities partner with operations to drive continuous improvement financial and operational performance lead the operational planning process interacting with vice presidents within finance and operations support expansion projects and new business initiatives third party agreements network location analyses drive variance analysis against budgets for the network identify risks and opportunities partner with retail it fulfillment teams to drive optimal cross functional decision that maximize amazon s long term free cash flow ensure timely and accurate metrics and forecasts are created and maintained degree finance computer science engineering or other quantitative area or other degree with equivalent experience years of experience finance leadership roles showing progression areas of responsibility results oriented highly energeticen dynamic individual with hands on mentality strong leadership and influencing skills advanced analytical skills and the ability to get into the details while seeing and understanding the big picture strong skills accessing and using analytical tools advanced computer literacy demonstrated ability to meet deadlines while managing multiple projects strong interpersonal skills including written and oral communication skills self starting capabilities ability to work with staff at all levels of the organization industry experience e commerce distribution retail or any other state of the art supply chain logistics industrial company demonstrated experience of successfully driving complex milestone driven projects and carrying out changes across multi country entities mba or equivalent is desirable optionen aktuell informationen unternehmen monster profil anzeigen weiter jobs
